mapper.select: SELECT distinct a.year_month_str FROM access a, blog b, post p WHERE a.blog_domain_name=b.domain_name AND a.year_month_str!=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y/%m') AND a.blog_domain_name=p.blog_domain_name AND a.link=p.link AND a.link!=b.address AND p.recommended=true GROUP BY a.year_month_str ORDER BY a.year_month_str DESC

SELECT a.year_month_str as yearMonthStr, a.link as postLink, max(b.domain_name) as blogDomainName, sum(a.amount) as accessCount FROM access a, blog b, post p WHERE a.blog_domain_name=b.domain_name AND a.blog_domain_name=p.blog_domain_name AND a.link=p.link AND a.link!=b.address AND p.recommended=true AND a.year_month_str=#{yearMonthStr}
AND p.published_at between concat(#{yearMonthStr}, '-01') and concat(#{yearMonthStr}, '-31') GROUP BY a.year_month_str, a.link ORDER BY accessCount desc LIMIT #{limit}
